message.content: **n8n** (pronounced "n-eight-n") is a workflow automation tool that combines low-code and event-triggered capabilities, built using Node.js. It allows users to create workflows by connecting nodes, each representing a step in a process, and supports both real-time triggers and scheduled tasks. n8n is open-source, self-hostable, and offers a visual interface alongside the ability to use code (JavaScript or Python) for more complex workflows. It supports over 1700 templates and integrates with numerous services, providing flexibility and control over automation processes[1][4][5].

personalizationAnswers.automationGoalDevopsOther: Build workflows to automate manual processes
